mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_server ( C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 ) VALUES( #{companyId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUse ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ipAddr ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_server SET C_COMPANY_ID = #{companyId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_IN_USE = #{inUse ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_IP_ADDR = #{ipAddr ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MANAGER_ID = #{managerId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SERVER_TYPE = #{serverType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG1 = #{tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG2 = #{tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG3 = #{tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG4 = #{tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE t_sys_server SET C_COMPANY_ID = #{companyId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_IN_USE = #{inUse ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_IP_ADDR = #{ipAddr ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MANAGER_ID = #{managerId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SERVER_TYPE = #{serverType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG1 = #{tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG2 = #{tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG3 = #{tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG4 = #{tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE C_SERVER_TYPE = #{serverType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and C_IP_ADDR = #{ipAddr ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 FROM t_sys_server WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 FROM t_sys_server
${orderBy}

SELECT C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 FROM t_sys_server
${orderBy}

SELECT C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 FROM t_sys_server
${orderBy}

SELECT C_COMPANY_ID, C_DOMAIN_ID, C_ID, C_IN_USE, C_IP_ADDR, C_MANAGER_ID, C_NAME, C_SERVER_TYPE, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4 FROM t_sys_server where C_IN_USE=1 AND C_SERVER_TYPE=#{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
